author: Unity
description:
Discover Unity's innovative solutions like 3D data streaming, Pipeline Automation, Asset Manager, and Unity Studio to enhance collaboration, data management, and application development in real-time 3D environments. 

Recorded at the Unity Industry Summit in Barcelona, Spain, November, 2025.

Discover Unity Industry: https://on.unity.com/UnityIndustry

Start free trial: https://on.unity.com/UnityIndustryTrial

Join the Unity Studio beta: https://on.unity.com/UnityStudio

#Unity #Unite2025 #3D
title: Breaking Barriers in Real-time 3D Adoption with Unity's Scalable Solutions | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
In this tip we’ll look at spawning in layouts and dynamically creating NavMesh surfaces during runtime using the AI Navigation package. Use the NavMeshSurface component to spawn in prefabs or layout elements, and have the Nav Mesh dynamically created during Play mode.

Learn more in docs: https://on.unity.com/AI_NavDocs

Find more free Unity learn resources: https://on.unity.com/Learn

Check out the full tutorial: https://on.unity.com/AI_NavTutorial

#gamedev #unitytips #unity3d #unitylearn
title: Unity 6 tips: Nav Mesh generation at runtime #gamedev #gamedevelopment #unity
